entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:09 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
